snippet: Col. Moussa Tiegboro Camara has been charged in connection with a 2009 massacre of pro-democracy demonstrators, making him the first high-ranking official to face trial for the atrocities.
abstract: Authorities in Guinea charge army Col Moussa Tiegboro Camara in connection with 2009 massacre of pro-democracy demonstrators at a soccer stadium, making him the first high-ranking official to face trial for the atrocities.
lead_paragraph: Col. Moussa Tiegboro Camara has been charged in connection with a 2009 massacre of pro-democracy demonstrators, making him the first high-ranking official to face trial for the atrocities.
